units.text: Time points of scarring induction were selected around critical steps of organoid development including EB formation (day 4), neural induction (day 7), neuroepithelium development (day 15) and neurogenesis (days 20 and 30). units.rationale: This excerpt details specific, actionable time points for organoid development and scRNA-seq sampling, forming a core procedural step.

units.text: We combined lineage information with pseudotemporal ordering to compare the distribution of cells over pseudotime in different lineages (Fig. 6f,g).
